}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This card is '''Dell''' P/N 01F484.
"(C)2000 3COM CORPORATION", the newer '''3Com''' logo, and some other stuff is silkscreened on the top of this particular board (MAC: 000476E7A2C2, 3C905CX-TXM, 03-0247-200 ''C'', S/N: HQKRE7A2C2). :The Ethernet controller (BGA package) is labeled with... :*the newer '''3Com''' logo :*'''920-ST03''' :*'''3Com 40-0664-003''' :*'''M94010 UA A''' :*'''0140'''
